Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
Start class for the server side of the project

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Server()
    Used to create the server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addInQueue(String nickname)
    Adds a new client in the queue and notifies setGame() method that was waiting for clients.
    void
    findSavedGames()
    Find if there are game files, if not it creates the directory
    void
    initialize()
    Initializes the server's attributes (not only at the beginning but also at the end of a game).
    static void
    listen()
    A loop that always listens from the server's terminal (useful if a user wants to stop server).
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    The start method for the server: checks the system name to select saved games' directory and sets socket and rmi ports based on parameters (or using default ports).
    void
    onEndGame(String gameFilePath)
    Re-initializes server at the end of a game to let it be ready for new games.
    void
    removeFromQueue(String nickname)
    Removes a client from the queue.
    void
    setAvailablePlayers(String nickname, int availablePlayers, String gameName)
    Allows the first player to set the number of available players.
    void
    setGame()
    A loop used at the beginning of the game with the aim of waiting for the first (to ask him players' number or saved games) and for the other clients.
    void
    setSavedGame(boolean wantToSave, String gameName)
    Called when the player wants to resume a saved game.
    void
    start()
    Starts server's features, creating RMI and Socket interfaces.
    boolean
    startRMI()
    Opens RMI interface to accept connections with this technology.
    void
    startSocket()
    Opens socket interface, with the infinitive loop that accepts socket's connection (every 20 ms, while stop == false).

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Used to create the server

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The start method for the server: checks the system name to select saved games' directory and sets socket and rmi ports based on parameters (or using default ports).
      Parameters:
      args - Arguments inserted by the player on start

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the server's attributes (not only at the beginning but also at the end of a game).

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts server's features, creating RMI and Socket interfaces.

    • startRMI

      public boolean startRMI()
      Opens RMI interface to accept connections with this technology.
      Returns:
      false if an error occurs.

    • listen

      public static void listen()
      A loop that always listens from the server's terminal (useful if a user wants to stop server).

    • startSocket

      public void startSocket()
      Opens socket interface, with the infinitive loop that accepts socket's connection (every 20 ms, while stop == false).

    • findSavedGames

      public void findSavedGames()
      Find if there are game files, if not it creates the directory

    • setAvailablePlayers

      public void setAvailablePlayers(String nickname, int availablePlayers, String gameName)
      Allows the first player to set the number of available players. Notifies setGame() method that was waiting for the first.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the client that wants to set players.
      availablePlayers - to set.
      gameName - the name to be set for this game.

    • setSavedGame

      public void setSavedGame(boolean wantToSave, String gameName)
      Called when the player wants to resume a saved game.
      Parameters:
      wantToSave - true if he wants to resume a game.
      gameName - the name of the game to be resumed.

    • addInQueue

      public void addInQueue(String nickname)
      Adds a new client in the queue and notifies setGame() method that was waiting for clients.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the new user.

    • removeFromQueue

      public void removeFromQueue(String nickname)
      Removes a client from the queue. Useful at the beginning of the game: if the game is not still started, the queue is used to manage clients that go out before the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the client that has gone out.

    • setGame

      public void setGame()
      A loop used at the beginning of the game with the aim of waiting for the first (to ask him players' number or saved games) and for the other clients. When the game is complete (and, if it is a new game, all the clients are online), it starts the game, calling methods on GameController.

    • onEndGame

      public void onEndGame(String gameFilePath)
      Re-initializes server at the end of a game to let it be ready for new games.
